LanguageData.ANDH.BondedDetectionChance.Description: Adjust metalhorror detection chance by bonded animals nuzzling their owners. 0.0 ~ 1.0.
LanguageData.ANDH.CanTriggerEmerging.Description: Nuzzling can sometimes make metalhorrors emerge.
LanguageData.ANDH.DetectionChance.Description: Adjust metalhorror detection chance by random pets nuzzling random people. 0.0 ~ 1.0.
LanguageData.ANDH.DetectionRadius.Description: Adjust how far the other colonists can detect metalhorrors from nuzzling. 3.0 ~ 100.0.
LanguageData.ANDH.EmergenceChance.Description: Adjust metalhorror emerging chance by pets nuzzling (Requires "Can emerge from nuzzling"). 0.0 ~ 1.0.
LanguageData.ANDH.MetalhorrorReasonNuzzled: {INFECTED_nameDef}'s metalhorror emerged because it was discovered by {NOTICED_nameDef} from an interaction with {PAWN_nameDef}.
LanguageData.ANDH.NuzzleDetectedDesc: {NOTICED_nameDef} has noticed {PAWN_nameDef}'s unusual behavior around {INFECTED_nameDef}. {PAWN_nameDef}, who would normally be comfortable around {INFECTED_nameDef}, suddenly withdrew as if sensing something was off. In hindsight, {PAWN_nameDef} could recall moments when {INFECTED_nameDef}'s behavior seemed slightly peculiar. {NOTICED_nameDef} suspects that {INFECTED_nameDef} might be infected with a metalhorror.
LanguageData.ANDH.NuzzleBondedDetectedDesc: {NOTICED_nameDef} has noticed {PAWN_nameDef} acting strangely around {PAWN_possessive} faithful friend, {INFECTED_nameDef}. {PAWN_nameDef}, who usually enjoyed {INFECTED_nameDef}'s company, suddenly withdrew as if something was amiss. In hindsight, {PAWN_nameDef} could recall moments when {INFECTED_nameDef}'s behavior seemed slightly peculiar. {NOTICED_nameDef} suspects that {INFECTED_nameDef} might be infected with a metalhorror.
